Text: I will seed this movie until I feel I have done my purpose.

Hands down one of the best Asian films I've seen. Gang fight scene is reminder "never quit!"  Not your typical revenge film, filled with pathos, violence, compassion, & gut-wrenching realism. An absolute must see.
